title: Building mybinder is fail
body:
*Original issue*: https://gitlab.com/lfortran/lfortran/-/issues/531

Building mybinder [![Binder](https://mybinder.org/badge_logo.svg)](https://mybinder.org/v2/gl/lfortran%2Fweb%2Flfortran-binder/master?filepath=Demo.ipynb) is fail by the following message.
```
=================================== FAILURES ===================================
__________________________________ test_print __________________________________

capfd = <_pytest.capture.CaptureFixture object at 0x7f817f87f990>

    def test_print(capfd):
        import ctypes
        libc = ctypes.CDLL(None)
        c_stdout = ctypes.c_void_p.in_dll(libc, 'stdout')

        e = FortranEvaluator()
        e.evaluate("""\
    integer :: x
    x = (2+3)*5
    print *, x, 1, 3, x, (2+3)*5+x
    """)
        libc.fflush(c_stdout) # The C stdout buffer must be flushed out
        out = capfd.readouterr().out
>       assert out == "25 1 3 25 50 \n"
E       AssertionError: assert 'ANTLR runtim... 1 3 25 50 \n' == '25 1 3 25 50 \n'
E         + ANTLR runtime and generated code versions disagree: 4.9.2!=4.7
E         + ANTLR runtime and generated code versions disagree: 4.9.2!=4.7
E           25 1 3 25 50

/srv/conda/envs/notebook/lib/python3.7/site-packages/lfortran/codegen/tests/test_fortran_eval.py:262: AssertionError
=========================== short test summary info ============================
FAILED codegen/tests/test_fortran_eval.py::test_print - AssertionError: asser...
========================= 1 failed, 95 passed in 7.91s =========================
Removing intermediate container 3f5acbca66f9
The command '/bin/sh -c ./binder/postBuild' returned a non-zero code: 1
```
